metadata.title: CVE-2019-14934 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in PDFResurrect before 0.18. pdf_load_pages_kids in pdf.c doesn't validate a certain size value, which leads to a malloc failure and out-of-bounds write.

criterions.comment: pdfresurrect package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.18-2').
